# ms-base-lib

> A Java library containing base types to be shared among microservices libraries and applications. Provides standardized status enumerations, comprehensive error handling framework, and foundational components for distributed systems.

This library is designed for Java 21+ microservices architectures and uses modern Java features including records, streams, and the latest Jakarta EE specifications. It follows SOLID principles, Clean Code practices, and provides extensive Javadoc documentation.

## Core Components

- [Status.java](lib/src/main/java/com/rubensgomes/msbaselib/Status.java): Lifecycle status enumeration for request/response operations in microservices. Supports both synchronous and asynchronous processing patterns with states for SUCCESS, FAILURE, PENDING, PROCESSING, COMPLETED, CANCELLED, ERROR, TIMEOUT, and ABORTED.

## Error Handling Framework

- [ApplicationError.java](lib/src/main/java/com/rubensgomes/msbaselib/error/ApplicationError.java): Interface for comprehensive error representation with description, structured error codes, and native diagnostic information.
- [ApplicationErrorCode.java](lib/src/main/java/com/rubensgomes/msbaselib/error/ApplicationErrorCode.java): Interface for standardized error codes with unique identifiers and human-readable descriptions.
- [ApplicationErrorImpl.java](lib/src/main/java/com/rubensgomes/msbaselib/error/impl/ApplicationErrorImpl.java): Concrete implementation of ApplicationError with Jakarta Bean Validation support and Lombok annotations.
- [ApplicationErrorCodeImpl.java](lib/src/main/java/com/rubensgomes/msbaselib/error/impl/ApplicationErrorCodeImpl.java): Enumeration of hierarchically organized error codes categorized as Business Logic (BUSGN###), Payment (PAYGN###), Resource Management (RESGN###), Security (SECGN###), System (SYSGN###), Validation (VALGN###), and Microservice-Specific (XXXMS###) errors.

## Package Documentation

- [com.rubensgomes.msbaselib](lib/src/main/java/com/rubensgomes/msbaselib/package-info.java): Core base types and foundational components
- [com.rubensgomes.msbaselib.error](lib/src/main/java/com/rubensgomes/msbaselib/error/package-info.java): Error handling and error code management framework
- [com.rubensgomes.msbaselib.error.impl](lib/src/main/java/com/rubensgomes/msbaselib/error/impl/package-info.java): Concrete implementations of error handling interfaces

## Build and Development

- [build.gradle.kts](lib/build.gradle.kts): Gradle build configuration with Java 21, Lombok, Jakarta EE, Spotless formatting, JUnit 5 testing, and Maven publishing setup.
- [README.md](README.md): Project overview, basic Gradle commands, build instructions, testing, release workflow, and publishing process.

## Key Features

- Thread-safe, immutable enum-based designs
- Comprehensive Javadoc documentation for all public APIs
- Jakarta Bean Validation constraints for data integrity
- Lombok annotations for boilerplate reduction
- Integration examples for Spring Framework and Jakarta EE
- Hierarchical error code naming convention for easy categorization
- Support for monitoring, observability, and distributed tracing
- Framework-agnostic design works with Spring, Jakarta EE, or standalone applications
